Intervention.evidence: Cohorts of three patients underwent cytoreductive surgery followed by a 2-h IPHC with escalating doses of oxaliplatin at a target outflow temperature of 40°C.

Objective.evidence: Therefore, we undertook a phase I evaluation of IPHC with oxaliplatin for peritoneal dissemination from colorectal and appendiceal cancers to establish the dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) and the maximum tolerated dose (MTD).

Number_Randomised.evidence: Fifteen patients were enrolled at two dose levels.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Dose-limiting toxicities at 250 mg/M 2 were observed in two of three patients enrolled in this study.

Harms.evidence: Dose-limiting toxicities at 250 mg/M 2 were observed in two of three patients enrolled in this study.
